title: The Apocalypse: Ultimate Survivalist
description: Six contestants are thrown together in a devastated wasteland with only the clothes on their backs and the will to survive. Rain or shine, in five days, only one will remain.
altHero: Col Dale Murphy with crossed arms
alt1: young blonde woman contestant named Kimberly
alt2: young brunette woman contestant in a bikini named Elena
alt4: young Black female Marine aiming a gun
